Description: Limestone ostracon or trial-piece with traces of six lines of Coptic letters and other motifs.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.36, pl.29)
Hasitzka 1990 / Neue Texte und Dokumentation zum Koptisch-Unterricht (p.52)
Cribiore 1996 / Writing, teachers, and students on Graeco-Roman Egypt (no. 73)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (65426) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/65426)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester

Miscellaneous number: O.Rain.UnterrichtKopt. 65 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
